attributes.action: investigate the role of MPs' involved in the trading of shares (directly or via an intermediary)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, petition the Government to obtain and release details of Members of Parliament who have traded in the sale or puchase of shares relating to institutions that have been hit by the current economic crisis (be this UK or International trade).  The details should include whether this has been done through the individual Member of Parliament or via an intermediary investing on their behalf.  If found to be involved in the underselling of shares (either personally or by an intermediary) which has resulted in them profiting from the current situation, disciplinary action should be taken and the results made freely available to the UK public.  This petition does not relate to MPs' disclosure of expenses for constitutional duties.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
